img_text: New Wavered 24-10-2018 It was a bad call, at the wrong end Of a long spar with a deadly portend Up his shit creek in his barbed wire boat With Debbie's putrid shit that kept it all afloat For an arse in his arse end of the world All on behalf of the Murdoch girls Being the subject of a new wavered song Well, ya get to see 'em all goin to his place He's the household name that helped start this race He's a fucked up, low down, pinioning, rewound Simonist, cocksucker has been then he found I reckon I'd seen it all but I swear Since TISM enabled their cerebal knievel Makin' me cough, and seein how far Not lettin' me have my day in the court
